snippet.title: Final Project (teaser 2)
snippet.description:
This is the second teaser that we release of our latest Half Life2 sp-mod
called Final Project (FP). As you can read at the end of this teaser caused the last Valve/Steam update us a lot of new problems with this mod. Things that worked well are suddenly corrupted in some way and we work very hard to fix
these issues so we finally can release our 4th Half Life 2 sp-mod.

localized.title: Final Project (teaser 2)
localized.description:
This is the second teaser that we release of our latest Half Life2 sp-mod
called Final Project (FP). As you can read at the end of this teaser caused the last Valve/Steam update us a lot of new problems with this mod. Things that worked well are suddenly corrupted in some way and we work very hard to fix
these issues so we finally can release our 4th Half Life 2 sp-mod.
